article_title: Hostage's cousin says Hamas is 'playing for time'
sentence: "  Recalling  the  moments  that  led  up  to  his  cousin's  kidnapping,  he  says  Tsachi's  18-year-old  daughter  Maayan  was  killed  the  same  day,  in  front  of  her  family,  as  Hamas  operatives  shot  their  way  through  the  family  home  and  into  a  bomb  shelter  where  they  were  hiding.
